product_name: The North Face Storm Waterproof Hiking Boots - Boys'
long_description: Lightweight and durable, the boys' Storm Waterproof Hiking Boots from The North Face offer waterproof, breathable coverage and comfortable support for days spent exploring the great outdoors. Split-suede and mesh uppers with HydroSeal(R) waterproof membranes provide durable, flexible coverage with plenty of breathability for comfort in warm weather. Gusseted tongue keeps out trail debris; toe bumpers and heel guards protect against impacts. Injection-molded EVA midsoles provide cushioning and support. Durable rubber outsoles on the boys' Storm Waterproof Hiking Boots from The North Face offer excellent traction on a variety of surfaces.
short_description: Lightweight and durable, the boys' Storm Waterproof Hiking Boots from The North Face offer waterproof, breathable coverage and comfortable support for days spent exploring the great outdoors.
